description: Fixed encoding issue where characters were replaced with question marks.

versions.description: Updated documentation and CognosDefaults.ps1 example. No new features.
Added a FileName parameter to specify saved file name. Included example of Multi User Environment in the CognosDefaults.ps1
Added second authentication attempt because sometimes authentication will fail for no reason but work in a few seconds.
Added additional recovery attempts when the Cognos Server returns an error code. Added additional CSV Cleanup Options.
Fix for capital CSV extension on Linux machines. Removed default string variables for usernames. Updated Synchronous Download example.
Synchronously run multiple reports at once. Please don't kill the Cognos Server.
Fix for reverting file after timeout on download and extra line at the end of output which was breaking imports for 3rd party programs.
This update includes version checks, file encoding output, fixes for sending emails on errors, additional examples in CognosDefaults.ps1
Craig Millsap - Cognos Analytics 11 upgrade. Saving complex prompts, waiting for report to complete, and validation error messages.
Craig Millsap - Recursive nested folders, email notifications, and waiting for live report to generate.
